issues.description:
Function transferToOwner() retrieves the transaction origin (tx.origin) using the ORIGIN opcode. Use msg.sender instead.
See also: https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/develop/security-considerations.html#tx-origin
issues.title: Use of tx.origin

issues.description: A possible transaction order independence vulnerability exists in function transferToOwner(). The value or direction of the call statement is determined from a tainted storage location
issues.title: Transaction order dependence
